channel.title: Interview on RamblingWare
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on RamblingWare

item.title: Continuous Learning at Work
item.description: I've been doing job interviews as of late and one question that keeps cropping up is about managing staff. \"What would you do if you were a technical manager? What would you do to improve your team and/or company?\" I'd have my folks continuously learn new skills every year. Before I dive into my reasoning I want to preface that IBM has an internal program specifically for this. Its called Think40.
